author: Will Axford, Houston Chronicle
title: The hottest news anchors in the world, according to Buzzfeed readers
text:
Photo: Gerald Herbert, Associated Press Image 15 of 15 The hottest news anchors in the world, according to Buzzfeed readers 1 / 15 Back to Gallery 
If you watch the news in Houston or San Francisco, there's a chance that you've seen one of the hottest news anchors in the world. 
That's according to Buzzfeed readers who submitted their top picks of hottest news anchors in the world to the website. 
NICE HAIR: Erik Barajas wins best anchor hair in Texas, KTRK says 
Erik Barajas of ABC 13 in Houston ranks number six on the list. What makes him hot? "His arms are huge," Buzzfeed wrote. 
Reggie Aqui of ABC 7 in San Francisco ranks at number seven. He says he once sang a duet with Dolly Parton. 
Also on the list in Morgan Chesky of KOMO in Seattle, Joe Moravsky of News 12 in Connecticut and Ernie Zuniga of San Antonio. 
Topping out the list is Adam Joseph for 6 ABC in Philadelphia at number two and Mike Woods of Fox 5 in New York City.
